GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
net: hinic: avoid kernel hung in hinic_get_stats64()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 693f31dc91568e61047fd2980a8235e856cd9ce8, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit edd384f682cc2981420628b769a1929db680f02f. For more details please see the references link.
